CustomField.description: If checked, when a chat starts from a record, automatically include context from both record-related *and* user-related sources defined for this agent. If unchecked (default), only record-related sources are used in record context.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, include both Record and User anchored context when on a record page. If unchecked, only Record anchored context is used when on a record page.
CustomField.label: Combine Record & User Context
